nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.recnplay

Class GameRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.recnplay.GameRecorder

  • public class GameRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    records the status of the maze after each time it updates, and stores the data in a json file.
